# @zonedigital/browserslist-config

[![Part of Zone Frontend][zone-fe-image]][zone-fe-url] [![npm][npm-image]][npm-url] [![downloads][downloads-image]][npm-url]

[zone-fe-image]: https://img.shields.io/badge/-frontend-lightgrey.svg?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&longCache=true&style=flat-square&colorA=2C2B39&colorB=1010E5
[zone-fe-url]: https://github.com/zone/frontend
[npm-image]: https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@zonedigital/browserslist-config.svg?style=flat-square
[npm-url]: https://npmjs.org/package/@zonedigital/browserslist-config
[downloads-image]: https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/@zonedigital/browserslist-config.svg?style=flat-square

This package provides Zone's browser matrix as a shared config.

## Installation

`npm i @zonedigital/browserslist-config`

## Usage

Add the following to your `package.json`

```json
"browserslist": [
  "extends @zonedigital/browserslist-config"
]
```
